content.text:
Mr. McCARTHY. Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the 
House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet on Monday, November 6, 2017, 
when it shall convene at noon for morning-hour debate and 2 p.m. for 
legislative business.
content.speaker: Mr. McCARTHY

content.text:
The SPEAKER pro tempore. Is there objection to the request of the 
gentleman from California?
content.speaker: The SPEAKER pro tempore

doc_title: ADJOURNMENT FROM FRIDAY, NOVEMBER 3, 2017, TO MONDAY, NOVEMBER 6, 2017
title: ADJOURNMENT FROM FRIDAY, NOVEMBER 3, 2017, TO MONDAY, NOVEMBER 6, 2017
